rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Look, I know what exhaust smells like,
and it was exhaust in the cockpit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0002
rows.name: Just check the duct work, would ya?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0003
rows.name: Oh, I'm checking. I just seriously doubt—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0004
rows.name: Hey, look at that! The intake/exhaust bypass is reversed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0005
rows.name: Oh man, it's a good thing I caught that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0006
rows.name: You CAUGHT that? You're the one who cleared me to fly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Everything okay?
It's not like you to flub a flight check, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0008
rows.name: Good thing you had a rugged pilot like Doug at the controls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0009
rows.name: Oh, hey, Elma! How'd it go out there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0010_m
rows.name: And...would this be...one of the you-know-whos?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0010_f
rows.name: And...would this be...one of the you-know-whos?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0011
rows.name: Cooooool...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0012
rows.name:
I'm Lin Lee Koo—mechanic and
top all-around fix-it gal for BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_JNK0010
rows.name: Look Skeptical

rows.label: xs01020100_SEL0011
rows.name: Find out how old Lin is.

rows.label: xs01020100_JNK0020
rows.name: Look Worried

rows.label: xs01020100_SEL0021
rows.name: Find out what happened with the exhaust.

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0013
rows.name: She's 13.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0014
rows.name:
And I know. She looks young, and she is young,
but trust me—she's one of our top talents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0015
rows.name: Ah, yeah, well that...uh...doesn't usually happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0016
rows.name: We know it doesn't, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0017
rows.name: Look, I know what you're thinking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0018
rows.name: But believe me—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0019
rows.name:
young as she may look—and yes, she is young—
she's actually one of our top talents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0020
rows.name: Most of the time, that is. Most of the time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0021
rows.name: Annnyway, you guys heading back to the barracks?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0022
rows.name: Yeah. Why do you ask?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0023
rows.name:
As long as you're here, why don't I take you on the transport?
It's a great way to see the city—I'll give you the grand tour.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0024
rows.name: That sounds like a great idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0025
rows.name: All right, Doug, I think that'll be all for today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0026
rows.name: You can clean up here and dock the Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0027
rows.name: What?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0028
rows.name: Don't mind the exhaust. I'll take care of it tomorrow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Don't mind it?! ...Wait, why am I cleaning up
your mess in the first place?! Lin? Lin![ST:wait ]
